text: Abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona n’abamugaye amaguru, ndetse n’abafite uburwayi ubwo ari bwo bwose, nta mugayo bazabarwaho cyangwa (igihe batagiye icyaha ku rugamba). Bityo, uzumvira Allah n’Intumwa ye, azamwinjiza mu busitani butembamo imigezi (Ijuru); naho uzatera umugongo, (Allah) azamuhanisha ibihano bibabaza
